title: Not getting icons from Halloween event
body:
So during the new doom bots event I played a couple games and even beat teemo at the end.

The problem is that it's been a couple weeks and I still haven't gotten my icon yet.

Should I expect it soon? .. or was there a requirement I missed, because I just thought I had to play/win a game of doom bots the teemoing

replies.body: We're sending these icons out in batches until the end of the day on*November 17th*. If you don't have it by the time the 18th rolls around, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of ya!

Any reason these ones are taking so long to grant? It seems like the icon grants are taking a whole lot longer than normal as of late. I remember it used to be like a week max. It wouldn't be so bad, but we also have no way to track the tasks we completed.

I'm not on the team that rolls out the icons, so I cannot personally speak to their methods or potential limitations. 

I will speculate that there are more players in League today than in previous years, so that could have something to do with it. Let me know if you have any other questions.
I am having the same problem. During the first weekend of Doom Bots i played in the teemoing and my team beat teemo. I haven't recieved any icons yet.
